article_title: Get All The Money You Deserve From Your Tax Refund 3/1/16
article_text: It’s tax season and shockingly, Americans have left more than an average of a billion dollars in unclaimed refunds on the table the past few years. And, to add to the confusion, you might be wondering how the Affordable Care Act will affect your tax return. We'll talk with H&R Block's Richard Gartland for advice and answers on how to get every penny that's rightfully ours.

We'll talk with H&R Block's Richard Gartland for advice and answers on how to get every penny that's rightfully ours.
It’s tax season and shockingly, Americans have left more than an average of a billion dollars in unclaimed refunds on the table the past few years.
And, to add to the confusion, you might be wondering how the Affordable Care Act will affect your tax return.
